name: Seeking J:USTICE
description:
(In it's current state, this is a complete game which should take roughly 5 hours. However, I plan  to release an updated version with fixed issues down the line (I'm aware of the music looping issues)).

---

Kes, a self-proclaimed freelancer, has journey to the small town of Grennia. All is well as she reads a book at the Luna Library, until a courier bursts in. Kes overhears that she'd gotten attacked in the middle of a delivery... over a book, of all things!

Deciding to help the courier get her delivery back, Kes gets wrapped up in something only slightly larger.
